title: Looking for Koreans on OCE to play with
body:
I am Korean myself but most of my friends are not so sometimes I get bored not speaking Korean for a while.
My Korean speaking is to an understandable level but my reading and writing are bad because I have lived in Australia for a long  time.
S4 and climbing if anyone wants to know, looking to get Gold before end of season.
See you on league!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
